verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> and unto Aaron<WH175>, saying<WH559>,

This is the service<WH5656> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, about the most<WH6944> holy things<WH6944>:

And upon the golden<WH2091> altar<WH4196> they shall spread<WH6566> a cloth<WH899> of blue<WH8504>, and cover<WH3680> it with a covering<WH4372> of<WH8476> sealskin<WH5785>, and shall put<WH7760> in the staves thereof<WH905>:

And they shall take away the ashes<WH1878> from the altar<WH4196>, and spread<WH6566> a purple<WH713> cloth thereon<WH899>:

And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> and unto Aaron<WH175>, saying<WH559>,

And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

This is the service<WH5656> of the families<WH4940> of the Gershonites<WH1649>, in serving<WH5647> and in bearing burdens<WH4853>:

they shall bear<WH5375> the curtains<WH3407> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, and the tent<WH4908> of meeting<WH4150>, its covering<WH4372>, and the covering<WH4372> of sealskin<WH8476> that is above<WH4605> upon it<WH4539>, and the screen for the door<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>,

This is the service<WH5656> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of the Gershonites<WH1649> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>: and their charge<WH4931> shall be under the hand<WH3027> of Ithamar<WH385> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>.
As for the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847>, thou shalt number<WH6485> them by their families<WH4940>, by their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>;

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even unto fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> shalt thou number<WH6485> them<WH935>, every one that entereth upon the service<WH6635>, to do<WH5647> the work<WH5656> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.

And this is the charge<WH4931> of their burden<WH4853>, according to all their service<WH5656> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>: the boards<WH7175> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, and the bars<WH1280> thereof<WH5982>, and the pillars thereof<WH134>, and the sockets thereof,

and the pillars<WH5982> of the court<WH2691> round about<WH5439>, and their sockets<WH134>, and their pins<WH3489>, and their cords<WH4340>, with all their instruments<WH3627>, and with all their service<WH5656>: and by name<WH8034> ye shall appoint<WH6485> the instruments<WH3627> of the charge<WH4931> of their burden<WH4853>.

This is the service<WH5656> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847>, according to all their service<WH5656>, in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, under the hand<WH3027> of Ithamar<WH385> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>.

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and the princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> numbered<WH6485> the sons<WH1121> of the Kohathites<WH6956> by their families<WH4940>, and by their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>,

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even unto fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>, every one that entered<WH935> upon the service<WH6635>, for work<WH5656> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>:
and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them by their families<WH4940> were two thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>.

These are they that were numbered<WH6485> of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites<WH6956>, all that did serve<WH5647> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, whom Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered<WH6485> according to the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> by<WH3027> Moses<WH4872>.
And those that were numbered<WH6485> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648>, their families<WH4940>, and by their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>,

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even unto fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>, every one that entered<WH935> upon the service<WH6635>, for work<WH5656> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>,
even those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH4940>, by their families, by their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>, were two thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970>.

These are they that were numbered<WH6485> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648>, all that did serve<WH5647> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, whom Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered<WH6485> according to the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
And those that were numbered<WH6485> of the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847>, by their families<WH4940>, by their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>,

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even unto fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>, every one that entered<WH935> upon the service<WH6635>, for work<WH5656> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>,
even those that were numbered<WH6485> of them by their families<WH4940>, were three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and two hundred<WH3967>.

from thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> even unto fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>, every one that entered<WH935> in to do<WH5647> the work<WH5656> of service<WH5656>, and the work of bearing burdens<WH4853> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>,
